question: What is the sustainable growth rate of the company that enjoys return on equity = 30% and a dividend pay-out ratio of 40% ?
explanation: Sustainable Growth Rate = Return on equity × (1 – Dividend Pay-out Ratio) Sustainable Growth Rate = 30% × (1 – 40% ) = 0.3 × (1 – 0. 4) = 0.18 = 18%
